KPIDefinition.Description: The actual usage and availability of the planned capacity of a machine, which is measured by the ratio of AUBT to planned unit busy time (PBT). The complementary part is the percentage of actual unit downtime.
KPIDefinition.Name: Allocation Efficiency (AE)
KPIDefinition.Formula: Allocation efficiency = Actual Unit Busy Time/Planned Busy Time
